Title: Goal-Driven Interactive Explanation
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 19:16:51 GMT Server: Apache/1.0.3 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 1397 Last-modified: Sat, 06 Jul 1996 18:44:06 GMT Goal-Driven Interactive Explanation Goal-Driven Interactive Explanation Description: Explanations play a fundamental role in many artificial intelligence tasks, but generating useful explanations remains a difficult problem.
